Ebook.title: Ebook
Ebook.description: Represents an ebook available on the CyberShelf platform.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Ebook entity.

description.description: A brief description or summary of the ebook.

fileUrl.description: URL of the ebook file stored in Supabase storage.

imageUrl.description: URL of the ebook cover image stored in Supabase storage.

isDisabled.description: Indicates whether the ebook is disabled or not.

Service.title: Service
Service.description: Represents a cybersecurity or tech service offered.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Service entity.

description.description: A detailed description of the service.

contactInformation.description: Contact details for inquiries about the service.

ContactRequest.title: ContactRequest
ContactRequest.description: Represents a contact request submitted through the contact form.

id.description: Unique identifier for the ContactRequest entity.

name.description: The name of the person submitting the request.

email.description: The email address of the person submitting the request.

submissionDate.description: The date and time when the request was submitted.

CartItem.title: CartItem
CartItem.description: Represents an item in the user's shopping cart.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CartItem entity.

quantity.description: The quantity of the ebook in the cart.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores user profile information, keyed by the user's UID from Firebase Authentication.

/ebooks/{ebookId}.description: Stores ebook data. Admin write access controlled via separate role collection.

/services/{serviceId}.description: Stores cybersecurity service data. Admin write access controlled via separate role collection.

/contact_requests/{contactRequestId}.description: Stores contact form submissions. Only accessible by admins.

/users/{userId}/cart_items/{cartItemId}.description: Stores cart items for a specific user. Path-based ownership ensures only the user can access their cart data.
